main event: John Doe reported observing an unidentified flying object over the New York World's Fair in New York City on May 6, 1964.
interesting points: The object was round in shape and silver in color.
The object hovered silently above the fairgrounds for several minutes.
The object accelerated rapidly and disappeared from view.
The object was estimated to be approximately 50 feet in diameter.
Project Blue Book investigators were unable to locate any evidence or witnesses to corroborate Doe's account.
location: New York World's Fair, New York City
photographs: no, the report does not include any photographs
